SummaryEnglish: Sarah is an ordinary 17 year old who is looking forward to her tertiary school life. Siew Lim is just your normal mom who decides to continue her education that she did not get to complete. Like any teenager her age, Sarah dreams of making new friends, going to parties and going through a new adventure in a new school. However there is one stumbling block to those dreams, her mom has enrolled into the same class as her. Follow the adventure and drama of a mom and her daughter while they go through their school life together, the friendships made, the betrayals, the bad choices and the bond affected between mom and daughter

1.SummaryEnglish: Sarah's all excited to start her tertiary school life and impress as a freshie. Until she finds out that her mom is her classmate that will release a can of worm in her school’s journey. Meanwhile, Teck reveals Andy, his aunt agony, a secret that may be good and bad for this new phase of his life.

2.TitleEnglish: Why Did You Tell Everyone She’s My Mom?!
2.SummaryEnglish: Sarah tried to keep that her mom is her classmate a secret. Sabrina asks Sarah to join her clique and be part of the school’s royalties. Andy suggests to Teck on a new career path because Andy feels Teck’s investment will never work

3.TitleEnglish: I’m Getting Her Out Of That Dress!
3.SummaryEnglish: Teck almost reveals his own secret to Siew Lim. Sarah, who is part of Sabrina's clique now, gets to hang out and also attend a cool party with them. Meanwhile, Leonard and Bella have a bet for their first group project.

4.SummaryEnglish: Sarah gets invited to a Halloween party. Siew Lim is suspicious about the party and gets Shikin to get her into the party. Joseph makes a move on Sarah. Andy bails Teck out of a David Goliath accident.

5.SummaryEnglish: Siew Lim runs for Class President and one of her rival candidates is Sabrina. While Siew Lim and her campaign team is running a clean campaign, Sabrina is using shaming tactic to beat Siew Lim. Teck and Andy spy on Sarah to find out about her and Joseph.

6.SummaryEnglish: Sabrina is seen as the common enemy to everyone. Siew and gang tries to ‘find out’ more about Sabrina. Andy and Siew tries as much to dodge from the arrival of their number one fear which leaves Teck to deal with her.

7.TitleEnglish: Can’t Believe You Cheated The Charity!
7.SummaryEnglish: A donation drive by the school reveals Sarah's dirty little secret since her debut of charity drive: writing random donors name when the money came from Teck. Siew insists on being morally correct in the methods of collecting donation until it becomes too competitive against Sabrina’s unorthodox way of collecting donation

8.SummaryEnglish: As Mr Robert reveals the opportunity to be selected for overseas internship programme in Milan, Sarah takes it a million notch higher to up her game. But the problem is, the groupings thru the selection algorithm may not lean towards her way.

9.SummaryEnglish: Sarah is being called to the Dean’s office thinking that she is one step closer to the overseas internship in Milan. Teck’s suspicion on Andy’s job leads him to take things in his own hands to find out further on how Andy gets so rich.

10.TitleEnglish: Nobody Buy From A Bookstore Anymore! (Finale)
10.SummaryEnglish: The family is getting very suspicious of Andy’s so called ‘blood’ money. Teck’s accident puts the family financial health in jeopardy. The bookshop will be the first to go, but is it ?
